charges.charge_disposition: Sentenced in Western District of Texas, San Antonio Division: Thirty-seven (37) months imprisonment on Count 2sss; three years supervised release and $100 special assessment. Eighty-four (84) months imprisonment on Count 3sss to run consecutive to count 2sss; three years supervised release to run consecuti ve and $100 spcecial assessment.
